title: S1 support/mid LF duo
body:
Looking for a duo who doesn't tilt easily, isn't going to rage all game and can get me those few more wins I need to get to gold. 
I have a spare Neo Pax Sivir on the off chance you can help before it expires tomorrow (4/11/2017).
 {{champion:15}} 

-Ragadoll

replies.body: I'd be happy to duo if you want.
